item.title: IMF Magazine Examines Present and Future of Bitcoin
item.description:
IMF Magazine Examines Present and Future of Bitcoin

In its quarterly, the IM F examines how Bitcoin and its blockchain technology may end up helping banks, despite being created to help avoid them. In the June 2016 issue of the International Monetary Fund's magazine, Finance & Development (F&D), it appeared in an article, The Internet of Trust written by Andreas Adriano and Hunter Monroe.

item.title: [Updated] Steam Users Can Now Pay for Games with Bitcoin - NEWSBTC
item.description:
[Updated] Steam Users Can Now Pay for Games with Bitcoin - NEWSBTC

With no financial risk to Valve in doing so, and a chance to attract even more customers from all over the world thanks to Bitcoin acting as a global payment instrument, this seems to be a very smart decision at an opportune time.

item.title: Australia to sell £8m of seized bitcoins - BBC News
item.description:
Australia to sell £8m of seized bitcoins - BBC News

A collection of bitcoins worth about £8m, which had been confiscated by police in Australia, will be auctioned off in June. The 24,518 bitcoins will be sold mostly in blocks of 2,000 - each with a value of about £680,000.

item.title: Ethereum Technical Analysis for 05/30/2016 - Market Primed For Another Big Move
item.description:
Ethereum Technical Analysis for 05/30/2016 - Market Primed For Another Big Move

Bitcoin's recent price appreciation has had a negative impact on the exchange rates of many alternative digital currencies, including Ethereum. However, since Friday, the ETH market has found some stability. Additionally, there are some technical patterns on the charts that are hinting at another big move.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/28/2016 - Bears Are Back! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 04/28/2016 - Bears Are Back! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price turned upon hitting the resistance at $460 as hinted by the bearish divergence. Bitcoin price turned upon hitting the resistance at $460 as hinted by the bearish divergence. Bitcoin price tested the $460 level and resistance held as predicted in the previous article.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on for Today's Session
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on for Today's Session

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price for this morning out of Europe. Just as we did last night, let's kick things off with a chart. The chart below shows action in the bitcoin price across the last 48 hours or so, and has the levels that we outlined last night being the ones to watch still overlaid.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Tonight's Asian Session - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Tonight's Asian Session - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at for tonight's session in the bitcoin price out of Asia The European session is drawing to a close, and it's heading into lunch time in the US. As usual, this means it's time for the second of our twice daily bitcoin price watch analysis pieces, so here goes.

item.title: Use Bitcoin at Amazon, AliExpress, and More With a Free Unichange Bitcoin Debit Card
item.description:
Use Bitcoin at Amazon, AliExpress, and More With a Free Unichange Bitcoin Debit Card

Bitcoin Press Release: Innovative Bitcoin exchange platform Unichange is pleased to announce the giveaway of free virtual Bitcoin debit cards that can be used at Amazon, AliExpress and more outlets. Starting today, Unichange launches its free giveaway of Unichange virtual debit cards to every customer ordering a Unichange plastic Bitcoin debit card.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Offers Trade Opportunities - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Offers Trade Opportunities - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price moved down and broke a support area. ETH/USD may trade a few points higher from here, but may face sellers. Ethereum price moved down and broke a support area. ETH/USD may trade a few points higher from here, but may face sellers.

item.title: Blockchain-based Revenue Platform Stem Announces US$4.5m Funding Round
item.description:
Blockchain-based Revenue Platform Stem Announces US$4.5m Funding Round

The software used by Stem, which is based on blockchain technology, lets creators aggregate data from a lot of different distribution platforms. Monetizing content on the Internet is not an easy task these days, but there are solutions under development as we speak.
